text: {{Infobox writer | name = Ayaz Jani | native_name = | native_name_lang = sd | image = | imagesize = | caption = | pseudonym = | birth_name = Ayaz Hussain | birth_date = | birth_place = Rehmat Pur Mahallah, Larkano, Sindh | death_date = | death_place = | occupation = Poet, journalist | nationality = | citizenship = | education = | alma_mater = | period = | genre = | subject = | movement = | notableworks = | spouse = | partner = | children = Ali Mansoor (Son) | relatives = Qurban Ali Memon (Father) | awards = | signature = | website = }} Ayaz Jani (original name Ayaz Hussain Memon) (, born 4 October 1967 â€“ died 6 June 2016) was a Pakistani poet and journalist. He wrote in the Sindhi language. Jani had been writing poetry since his school days and gained popularity as a romantic poet. Jani died on 6 June 2016 due to a heart attack in Larkana, Pakistan, aged 48. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Pakistani poets Category:Pakistani journalists Category:Disease-related deaths in Pakistan
